main event: On 22 June 1955, two civilians observed a round, silver object trailing white smoke in Springfield, Missouri.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 15-20 feet in diameter,The object traveled from NNE toward the south before turning west,It gave off a steady light,After 10-15 seconds, it disappeared behind a group of trees,The estimated speed of the object was 100 MPH.
sighted object: one round, silver object trailing white smoke
